Things required

  1. Manjal Podi
  2. Kumkum
  3. Sandal
  4. Mangala Akshathai
  5. Beetel leaves (Vetrilai)
  6. Kalipakku
  7. Coconut – 3 nos
  8. Mavilai & Thoranam – to decorate outside the entrance of the house and at the Mandapam.
  9. Vazhai Kannu ( 2 ft tall )
  10. Panchu Malai for Decorating Amman
  11. Kizangu Manjal, lemon and traditional Karukumani Kaatholai should be kept inside the Sombu along with White Rice.

Flowers & Fruits

  1. Banana – 12 nos
  2. Lotus – 6 nos
  3. Thazampoo – 2 nos
  4. Flower Garland – 2 nos
  5. Uthiri Flowers – for Archanai
  6. Stringed flowers – 10 yards

Naivedyam

  1. Poorna Kozhukotai – required level
  2. Paruppu Kozhukottai – required level
  3. Idli
  4. White Rice ( Mahaneyvedyam) with a dall
  5. Sweet Appam , Vadai and Payasam

Varalakshmi Vratham will be performed in the month of Kadaka or Simmam ( ie., Aadi or Avani month ) to be performed on Friday appearing before Pournami..

While performing Sankalpam for main Pooja kindly add the following WHERE THERE IS BLANK.

JAYA NAMASAMVATH SARE
DAKSHINAYANEY ( AYANAM )
GREESHMA RUTHU (RUTHU )
KADAKA MASE ( MONTH - AADI _)
SUKLA PAKSHEY (PPAKSHAM)
THRAYO DASYAM ( THITHI )
BRUGU VASARA YUKTHAYAM ( FRIDAY )
POORVASHADA NAKSHATREY ( FRIDAY STAR )

Varalakshmi Vratham sankalpam is available on the website to download (right click -> save target as / save link as)
